name: Slamslide
description:
Slamslide is a simple one-button game. 
You can jump, and once you're in the air you can slam down quickly to jump even higher. Dodge obstacles, and destroy crates to level up and unlock different color palettes, and difficulty settings!

Controls:
Jump/Confirm - Spacebar/Up Arrow/Left Mouse Button
Menu Control - Left and Right Arrows/Mouse Wheel

All tips will go towards funding the mobile version of Slamslide! Feedback/comments are also greatly appreciated :)

Want to follow the developers?
Programming/Design by Conradical's Games
Music by Aria Disconnect
